title: Topic 001 Question 084
body: You have a Fabric tenant that contains two workspaces named Workspace1 and Workspace2. Workspace1 contains a lakehouse named Lakehouse1. Workspace2 contains a lakehouse named Lakehouse2. Lakehouse1 contains a table named dbo.Sales. Lakehouse2 contains a table named dbo.Customers.
You need to ensure that you can write queries that reference both dbo.Sales and dbo.Customers in the same SQL query without making additional copies of the tables.
